trans-unit.source: Renders ink on a surface.
trans-unit.target: 在图面上呈现墨迹。

trans-unit.source: Ink rendering occurs in two ways: dynamic and static.
trans-unit.target: 墨迹呈现发生两种方式︰ 动态和静态。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic rendering occurs as ink is written to an inking surface: the stroke is rendered as it is being collected.
trans-unit.target: 墨迹写入到墨迹图面，将发生动态呈现︰ 描边呈现收集它时。

trans-unit.source: Static rendering occurs after stroke data is collected and attached to a new stroke.
trans-unit.target: 收集描边数据并将其附加到新的描边后，将发生静态呈现。

trans-unit.source: To render ink dynamically using the InkPresenter, attach the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer.RootVisual%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> to the InkPresenter by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.AttachVisuals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要呈现墨迹使用 InkPresenter 以动态方式，将附加<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer.RootVisual%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>到使用 InkPresenter<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.AttachVisuals%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.AttachVisuals%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer.RootVisual%2A>

trans-unit.source: To statically render ink, add stroke objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.Strokes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要以静态方式呈现墨迹，描边将对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.Strokes%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.Strokes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 排列的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> this element uses to arrange its child content.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>此元素用来排列其子内容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that represents the arranged size of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref> element and its child.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>表示的排列的大小的这<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref>元素及其子。

trans-unit.source: Attaches the visual of a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref> to an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将附加的视觉效果<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref>到<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Attach the visual of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> to dynamically render ink on your control.
trans-unit.target: 附加的视觉效果<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>动态呈现你的控件上的墨迹。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>

trans-unit.source: The visual of a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 视觉效果<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> that specifies the appearance of the dynamically rendered ink.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> ，指定动态呈现的墨迹的外观。

trans-unit.source: visual is already attached to a visual tree.
trans-unit.target: visual已附加到可视化树。

trans-unit.source: Detaches the visual of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 分离的视觉效果<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref>从<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> on a custom control changes, the visual of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> must be re-attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>自定义控件更改，<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>必须重新附加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter></xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>的视觉效果</xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Call the DetachVisuals and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.AttachVisuals%2A> methods to re-attach the visual to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>.
trans-unit.target: 调用 DetachVisuals 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.AttachVisuals%2A>方法来重新附加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>视觉对象</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.AttachVisuals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The visual of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref> to detach.
trans-unit.target: 视觉效果<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref>分离。

trans-unit.source: visual is not attached to the .
trans-unit.target: visual未附加到 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a clipping geometry that indicates the area that will be clipped if the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回指示将时要剪辑的区域的剪辑几何图形<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*>属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*>

trans-unit.source: The available size of the element.
trans-unit.target: 元素的可用大小。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that represents the area that is clipped when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> ，它表示为区域剪切时<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*>是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the child element at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: 获取子处指定元素 index 位置。

trans-unit.source: Index position of the child element.
trans-unit.target: 子元素的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The child element at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的子元素 index 位置。

trans-unit.source: Measures the child element of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref> to prepare for arranging it during the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.ArrangeOverride*> pass.
trans-unit.target: 测量的子元素<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref>准备对其进行排列过程<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.ArrangeOverride*>都会通过。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.ArrangeOverride*>

trans-unit.source: An upper limit <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that should not be exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 上限<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>不应超过。

trans-unit.source: The target <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> of the element.
trans-unit.target: 目标<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>的元素。

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.InkPresenterAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 提供适当<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.InkPresenterAutomationPeer"></xref>实现此控件，作为的一部分[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]基础结构。

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.InkPresenterAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 提供适当<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.InkPresenterAutomationPeer"></xref>实现此控件，作为的一部分[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]基础结构。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the strokes that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"></xref> displays.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置描边<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"></xref>显示。

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The strokes that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"></xref> displays.
trans-unit.target: 描边， <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"> </xref>显示。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.Strokes*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.Strokes*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that is equal to the number of visual child elements of this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，它等于此实例的可视子元素的数目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The number of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: 可视子元素的数目。
